entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
